activities: Associates for International Research, Inc. [AIRINC] collects, under contract, personal data (viz. names, city, country, family size, broad salary range) of our clients' employees in order to determine effective rates and methods of compensation to those employees by their employers, our clients. AIRINC also collects publicly available data regarding cost of living, including housing, utilities, goods and services, in order to provide generalized data on cost of living in locations around the world. All private data is collected solely under contract to our clients and held as confidential, according to our privacy policies as outlined at https://secure.air-inc.com/common/privacynotice.aspx .
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: human resources data; names, city, country, family size, salary range
privacyprograms: AIRINC contracts SMPOne (Waltham, MA, USA) to consult, implement and maintain internal security programs.
